data.current_description: Read a page of leads. Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.
data.summary_suggestion: List leads with pagination and property filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of leads from the system. Use the `properties` query parameter to specify which lead properties to include in the response. Supports pagination through limit and offset parameters. Returns a collection of lead objects with the requested properties and pagination metadata for retrieving additional pages.

data.current_description: Create a lead with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID. Documentation and examples for creating standard leads is provided.

Returns the created lead object including the system-generated ID and all provided properties. The lead is immediately available for retrieval and association with other objects.

data.summary_suggestion: Search leads by criteria and filters
data.description_suggestion: Searches for leads matching specified criteria using the PublicObjectSearchRequest. Accepts filter conditions, sort parameters, and property specifications to customize the search. Returns a collection of lead objects matching the search criteria with pagination support for large result sets. Enables complex queries beyond simple property filtering for advanced lead discovery and segmentation.

data.current_description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{leadsId}`or optionally a unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. `{leadsId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, and the `idProperty` query param refers to a property whose values are unique for the object. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
